instruction: Create a marketing campaign for a new game console.
output: Our new game console is here! With its cutting edge graphics, realistic gameplay, and unbeatable price, it’s a must-have for every gaming enthusiast. Join our online community to find out the latest news about upcoming games and exclusive offers - you won’t want to miss out on this! Tune into our livestreams to get even more insight into the world of gaming, and get ready to level up your experience with this revolutionary console.
